description:
This module is the continuation of MCM 1 and will be mandatory for BMus students in their second semester of study. MCM 2 continues the examination from the
following components - melody and motivic development; harmonic structures and voice-leading schemata; phrase and formal structures. Aural skills will be an additional component to further develop the students’ abilities to listen analytically and reflect upon the musical experience and its relationship to performance, listening and creativity. This module balances analytical, creative and aural-based activities and engages further connection with the curriculum and students’ practice.
title: Musical Concepts and Materials 2
